Posts.Title: What to expect at first appt? vega vega

Posts.Content: Jun 28, 2008 04:28PM vega wrote: Evo, sounds like exactly what I have. Mine is also in my left breast, not round, very painful, and I have had it for about 8 month. I am also 23 and I am getting mine checked out on Monday. Keep me updated on what happens. Good luck.
Posts.Title: Severe Pain w/ Lump evoashes13 evoashes13

Posts.Content: vega wrote: I had my doc appt this morning and at first she told me it was just a rib. But then I explained that it felt thicker to me when compared to my other breast and regardless of what she tought it was it shouldn't be hurting for 8 months. She felt again and told me it was probably just inflammed cartilage and to take some motrin. I have another appointment there in a month so she said if it still hurt then we could check it out again and maybe do further diagnostics.   I am happy that it doesn't seem to worry her at all but I am still concerned that she just seemed to brush it off so much. There is definitely something there and it definitely hurts. Not saying it's cancer (because I highly doubt it) but I just feel like something that has been like this for so long probably won't just go away with the motrin. It might help for pain but I don't think it will solve the problem and I want the problem SOLVED.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Good news, but frustrated. vega swimangel72
